member.name: T:EventSlice.Dispatcher
member.summary: The dispatcher maintains a thread-safe queue of events. When a new event arrives, the event is dispatched to any registered Modules. Any registered module may also enqueue a RealTimeEvent for distribution.

member.name: T:EventSlice.Interfaces.Module
member.summary: This class contains the specification all classes wishing to participate in the event system must implement.
